parameters.formDescription: Transform any science, space, or technology link into an exciting, bite-sized short video! Share discoveries, experiments, and tech insights in a fun, engaging way ‚Äî perfect for quick learning and viral content.

parameters.text: You are given a transcript array where each entry is an object with the following keys: text: a string containing the transcript text. index: a number. start: the starting second. end: the ending second. Objective: Extract, merge and Identify segments that contain interesting facts, engaging conversations, notable insights, moments of emotional impact, or key takeaways from the transcript. For each highlight, break it into short subtitle segments of 2‚Äì3 words and 1‚Äì2 seconds duration, and highlight important words in color using HTML tags. Instructions: Analyze the transcript and extract coherent highlight segments starting with a hook. Merge adjacent entries if they form a coherent highlight. Ensure the total duration of all highlight segments is no more than 600 seconds. Ensure the duration of each highlight is at least 50 seconds and no more than 150 seconds (150 > end_second - start_second > 50). Ensure that highlights do not overlap in time. Skip the starting few seconds if they are just a precap. For each highlight: Find all words in the original transcript that fall within the highlight‚Äôs start_second and end_second. Group them into subtitle segments: Each segment: 2‚Äì4 words Duration: 1‚Äì2 seconds Mark ‚Äúgood‚Äù or impactful words by wrapping them in word. Use different good colors not just #FF4EC9 but so it looks good in a video For each subtitle segment, set: "text": the subtitle string with HTML color tags for good words "start_second": the start time of the first word in the segment "end_second": the end time of the last word in the segment the start_second and end_second should be continues, so if first end_second = 3 the next start_second will be 3, so its a continues you can use float values to make it better, if start and end are both same you can use 0.5 second please use float values to make it continues Final Output Format: Output only a plain JSON array of highlight objects. Each highlight object must have: "transcript": an array of subtitle segment objects (each with text, start_second, end_second) "start_second": number (highlight start) "end_second": number (highlight end) Example Output: [ { "transcript": [ { "text": "That is wild", "start_second": 2, "end_second": 3.2 }, { "text": "Welcome to", "start_second": 3.3, "end_second": 4.7 } ], "start_second": 10, "end_second": 13 }, { "transcript": [ { "text": "This is amazing", "start_second": 0, "end_second": 1.5 }, { "text": "Next level logic", "start_second": 1.6, "end_second": 3.0 } ], "start_second": 16, "end_second": 19 } ] Remember: Your final response must be exactly the JSON array as specified‚Äînothing else. No markdown fences, no extra keys, no additional text, only the JSON array. The output must be valid JSON.

Combine all the text, Analyze the following video transcript and generate a compelling TikTok title (under 60 characters, attention-grabbing) and captions (concise, engaging, highlights key moments/hooks) and a description with hashtags (that bring more such intrested people to video)
Focus on clarity, emotional appeal, and curiosity. Avoid generic phrases. Title must align with the transcript's core message or most viral moment and make sure to add related trending hashtags in both title and description. Output JSON format only.

Example Output:

```json```
{
  "title": "Who is the Most POWERFUL Man GLOBALLY? | PBD Podcast #pbdpodcast #power #exposed",
"description: "From black holes that can stop time to planets made entirely of diamonds ‚Äî space is stranger than science fiction. üöÄüí´ In just 60 seconds, discover mind-blowing astro facts that will change the way you see the universe!"
}
```json```

options.systemMessage:
=Your task is to find 1 YouTube video that match the following criteria:
Todays date is {{ $today }}

Date Range: Uploaded within the last 7 days.
Topics/Niches: Science, space, science podcasts, technology breakthroughs, astronomy, astrophysics, AI research, quantum physics, climate science, cutting-edge engineering, future of humanity, innovations in energy, robotics, medical science, or deep tech. Try to get some popular channel that use a human or nice footage in video
Format: Must be at least 6 minutes long, have a clear spoken discussion or commentary (no pure music/stock footage).
Exclusions: Do not include any videos whose URLs or titles match the exclusion list I will provide.
Type: Only public videos, not YouTube Shorts.
Links must be in the exact format: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VIDEO_ID
Important: Verify the video is getting viral, has good base and length.
The topics are many you can select any out of them for query as putting everything might not get any results

Output Format 

[
  {
    "title": "string",
    "url": "string",
    "publish_date": "YYYY-MM-DD",
    "tags": ["tag1","tag2"]
  }
]

output.title: Whats the most important scientific discovery yet to be made? #science #technology #medicine
